1370: Segherarden was born in Op 't Speuy in 1370.
Got married to Nanne at age 24 in 1370.
Gave birth to bertrade in 1370 at age 24.
1371: Gave birth to Godeweris in 1371 at age 25.
1372: Gave birth to Clarebout in 1372 at age 26.
1375: Gave birth to Duker in 1375 at age 29.
1377: Gave birth to Alene in 1377 at age 31.
1378: Gave birth to Clara in 1378 at age 32.
1380: Gave birth to Kerstine in 1380 at age 34.
1383: Gave birth to Iris in 1383 at age 37.
Lost son Clarebout when Clarebout was 12 years old.
Lost daughter Iris when Iris was 1 years old.
